google-readability-avoid-underscore-in-g.description:
Description

Checks whether there are underscores in googletest test suite names and test
names in test macros:

TEST
TEST_F
TEST_P
TYPED_TEST
TYPED_TEST_P

The
FRIEND_TEST
macro is not included.

For example:

TEST
(
TestSuiteName
,
Illegal_TestName
)
{}
TEST
(
Illegal_TestSuiteName
,
TestName
)
{}

would trigger the check.
Underscores are not allowed
in test suite name nor
test names.

The
DISABLED_
prefix, which may be used to
disable test suites and individual tests
, is removed from the test suite
name and test name before checking for underscores.

This check does not propose any fixes.
google-readability-avoid-underscore-in-g.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
